Describe your experience with Python and which libraries you use during your day to day
Answer: I have 6 months of experience with Python. I frequently use libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for data analysis and visualization.

Question: Describe your experience with Azure and which features you have worked with professionally
Answer: I have 4 years of experience working with Microsoft Azure. I have extensively used Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). I have also worked with Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipelines and Azure Monitor for logging and monitoring.

Describe your experience with OOP best practices
Answer: I have extensive experience with Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) best practices. I follow principles such as SOLID (Single Responsibility, Open/Closed, Liskov Substitution, Interface Segregation, and Dependency Inversion) to write clean, maintainable, and scalable code. I also use design patterns like Singleton, Factory, and Observer to solve common problems. Additionally, I ensure proper encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism in my code to improve reusability and readability.
